intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce the second bugfix release in the stable 1.12 release series of your favourite cross-platform multimedia framework!
This release only contains bugfixes and it is safe to update from 1.12.x. For a full list of bugfixes see Bugzilla.
See &site;/releases/1.12/ for the full release notes.

bug.summary: Deadlock in ges-launch between the gst_plugin_loading_mutex and class_init_rec_mutex
